text:
Celebrating 2016 Successes
By Jennifer Milner|Wednesday, February 8, 2017
The GetInsured team works hard, but they can just as equally play hard. Last week, we took time out to celebrate what a great year 2016 was for the company and headed down to the Mountain Winery  a famous concert venue and winery nestled in the hills above Saratoga, California. Employees spouses and children joined the We are One celebration, giving us the chance to connect with new friends and reconnect with old ones. 
The GetInsured team works hard, but they can just as equally play hard. Last week, we took time out to celebrate what a great year 2016 was for the company and headed down to the 
Mountain Winery
  a famous concert venue and winery nestled in the hills above Saratoga, California. Employees spouses and children joined the We are One celebration, giving us the chance to connect with new friends and reconnect with old ones. 
The evening, which was themed on being part of the global community, was punctuated with a lively reception, two energizing musical acts and a series of toasts by the companys leadership. And after a smattering of delicious international foods, the group embarked on an escape room themed contest that incorporated things we hold near and dear to our hearts in our line of work: healthcare, geography, and social media. Congratulations go to Table #5, but we think a rematch is in order!
